name: Single Kettlebell Overhead Mobility Complex
description: A unilateral kettlebell complex emphasizing overhead stability, mobility, and full-body strength. Five compound movements performed with one kettlebell, 5 rounds x 5 reps each side. @Asgooch used 24kg.

exercises.name: Single Arm Kettlebell Row
exercises.description: From a hinged position with the kettlebell hanging, pull the kettlebell towards the hip using the back muscles, keeping the core engaged and spine neutral.
exercises.notes: 5 reps per side; controlled pull, full range of motion.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Snatch
exercises.description: Explosively pull the kettlebell from the hang position overhead in one motion, punching through at the top to lock out the arm.
exercises.notes: 5 reps per side; use hip drive, keep bell close to body.

exercises.name: Overhead Kettlebell Lunge
exercises.description: With the kettlebell held overhead in one hand, step forward into a lunge, keeping the front knee over the ankle and torso upright.
exercises.notes: 5 reps per side; maintain overhead lockout for stability.

exercises.name: Overhead Kettlebell Squat
exercises.description: Holding the kettlebell overhead, squat down until thighs are parallel to the ground, then drive up through the heels while keeping arm extended.
exercises.notes: 5 reps per side; engage core, avoid arching back. Controlled tempo.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Push Press
exercises.description: From the racked position, dip at the knees and use leg drive to press the kettlebell overhead, locking out the arm.
exercises.notes: 5 reps per side; generate power from legs, not just arms.

circuit.notes: Perform exercises in sequence as a flowing complex, all reps per side before switching. Focus on smooth transitions and overhead mobility. 24kg used in demo.

raw.caption:
One kettlebell is all you need for this overhead and mobility focused complex.

5 Rounds x 5 Reps each side, I used 24kg

https://www.kettlebellworkout.com/ for Programs to improve strength, mobility, conditioning, and athleticism with kettlebells.

#kettlebell #workout
raw.visualSummary: A muscular man in black athletic wear demonstrates the complex barefoot on grass with palm trees and playground in background. Rows, snatches, overhead lunges, overhead squats, and push presses flowing together.

uncertainties: Exercise order inferred from frames and overlays
Rest times not specified, defaulted to 60s between rounds
